title: Diamond Crescent Pendant - Chandramukhi Vibhushan

features: This crescent-shaped pendant features a graduated diamond design, resembling the Chandramukhi (crescent moon). The delicate openwork border adds a touch of modern elegance. The tiered design showcases exceptional craftsmanship and sparkle.

description: This diamond crescent pendant is a modern take on classic South Indian jewelry. The intricate diamond setting and high-quality materials ensure a dazzling and durable piece. Its unique design sets it apart, making it a treasured addition to any jewelry collection.
